frameDefinitions: This frame concerns the appointment of a New_leader or removal from office of an Old_leader.
A Hunter tries to gain Food by way of outsmarting or tracking a living.
An Ingestor consumes food or drink (Ingestibles), which entails putting the Ingestibles in the mouth for delivery to the digestive system.

An individual or group, the Patrol moves through and examines a Ground in order to ensure that it is in a generally Desired_state_of_affairs, particularly that it is safe and contains no dangerous Unwanted_entity.
Partner_1 interacts with Partner_2 (also collectively expressible as Partners) to change their social relationship.
A Gatherer removes Crop ripe and ready to an accepted degree.
frameExamples: On March 17 , Mamedov <t>appointed</t> Rakhim Gasiyev as Defence Minister .
In the Congo, he hunted big game for the first time.
Detective Jones <t>patrolled</t> the northern half of the building.
I <t>befriended</t> the little pony by giving him a piece of apple.
They <t>harvest</t> their pumpkins in the Autumn. INI
listRoleDefinitions: The Selector (most commonly a group of people) is responsible for a change in leadership.  Typically, it occurs as the External Argument of verbs.

With words denoting removal (or attempted removal) from office of a leader, the <fen>Old_leader</fen> is typically the direct object of verbs, or occurs in a PP Complement with noun targets, frequently headed by the preposition <ment>against</ment>.
With words denoting appointment to a position, the <fen>New_leader</fen> is typically the object of verbs.

Frequently the <fen>Old_leader</fen> or <fen>New_leader</fen> is referred to only by his/her role. However, the <fen>Role</fen> can be expressed separately from the leader, usually as either a secondary predicate or in a PP Complement.
The role <fen>Old_order</fen> identifies the political order that existed before the change of leadership occurs.
The <fen>Function</fen> is the purpose the <fen>New_leader</fen> will fufill.
A group of individuals who are elected or appointed to perform some function of governance.
When the change takes place.
Where the change takes place.
The <fen>Hunter</fen> is the agent hoping to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
<fen>Food</fen> is the sought-out item by the <fen>Hunter</fen>.
This is the entity to which the <fen>Hunter</fen> pays attention. It is referred to as <fen>Ground</fen> because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Food</fen>.
When the <fen>Time</fen> seeking action occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Hunter</fen> attempts to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
The <fen>Ingestor</fen> is the person eating or drinking.
The <fen>Ingestibles</fen> are the entities that are being consumed by the <fen>Ingestor</fen>.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The person (or group) who inspects the <fen>Ground</fen> to see that it is safe.
The area that the <fen>Patrol</fen> inspects with to ensure its safety.
An entity whose presence would impair the desirability or safety of the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The desired outcome of the patrolling. Normally this constituent is a PP Complement headed by <ment>for</ment>, or a <ment>to</ment>-marked VP Complement.
The desirable state of affairs which the <fen>Patrol</fen> hopes to ensure by visiting <fen>Ground</fen>.
>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Patrol</fen> examines the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The individual who comes to form a relationship with Partner_2.
The individual whose relationship with <fen>Partner_1</fen> changes.
The individuals whose relationship is changing.
The time when the relationship changes.
Where the relationship is formed.
The <fen>Gatherer</fen> is the agent gathering the <fen>Crop</fen>.
<fen>Crop</fen> is item being collected together by the <fen>Gatherer</fen>.
The <fex name='Source'>Source</fex> is the ground where the <fex name='Crop'>Crop</fex> is gathered from.
When the <fen>Crop</fen> gathering action occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Gatherer</fen> gathers his <fen>Crop</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The voters</fex> elected Blair.
The students overthrew <fex>the president</fex>.
The president appoints <fex>the prime minister</fex>.
The board of directors appointed Ashton <fex>Acting President</fex>.
The rebels overthrew <fex>the dictatorship</fex>.
His district elected her  <fex>to Congress</fex> three times.
The <fex>2000</fex> coup against the dictator was led by former president Smith.
The crew mutinied <fex>out in the middle of the Atlantic</fex>, the scoundrels.
Europe's billionaires hunt boars <fex>in Romania</fex>.
<fex>Detective Jones</fex> patrolled the northern half of the building.
Four soldiers with submachine guns patrolled <fex>the room</fex>, and an officer made his rounds at frequent intervals.
Security guards patrolled <fex>for intruders</fex> while the game was in progress.
Patrol all unlit areas <fex>to ensure no one is hiding there</fex>.
All our grounds are regularly patrolled <fex>for safety</fex>.
Officerspoliced the parade grounds <fex>during the Memorial day events.</fex> .
She married Stephen <fex>last summer</fex>.
We married <fex>in a gazebo</fex>.
<fex>Small growers</fex> can harvest quality crops.
<fex>Tubers</fex> harvested immediately after spraying developed gangrene.
They picked the apples <fex>from the tallest trees</fex>.

the Upper Big Branch Miners Memorial
the West Virginia Office of Miners' Health Safety and Training
